Bash(gh release create v0.1 --title "v0.1 - Armor Wiki Generator" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Initial Release - Armor Wiki Generator

This release includes the `generate_armor_wiki.py` script that converts Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria armor data \(UAsset JSON exports\) into MediaWiki templates.

### Features

- Parses DT_Armor.json and DT_ItemRecipes.json from UAssetAPI exports
- Generates wiki templates with:
  - Item infobox \(type, subtype, tier\)
  - In-game descriptions
  - Unlock requirements for Campaign and Sandbox modes
  - Stats \(durability, protection, effectiveness, damage modifiers\)
  - Crafting information \(time, stations, materials\)
- Handles special cases:
  - DLC detection from asset paths
  - Tinted armor variants \(Amzul, Masharuz, Shayar\)
  - Cosmetic-only items
  - Manual unlock overrides for unique items
  - Fragment collection with tier-based location hints
- Excludes DEV/test items automatically

### Output

Generates 153 armor wiki templates in `output/armor/`
EOF
\)")

Bash(gh release create v0.2 --title "Release 0.2 - Weapons Wiki Generator" --notes "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## New Features

### Weapons Wiki Generator
Added `generate_weapons_wiki.py` to generate MediaWiki templates for weapon items.

**Features:**
- Damage, durability, speed, energy cost, block damage reduction, and armor penetration stats
- Damage type mapping \(Piercing, Slashing, Bludgeoning with weapon subtypes\)
- One-handed/Two-handed weapon classification
- Campaign and Sandbox unlock overrides for 42+ weapons with unique unlock methods
- Proper a/an grammar handling for article selection
- Zero-value stat suppression \(stats with 0 are not displayed\)
- Durability -1 displayed as "Expended on use" for ammunition
- Exclusions for TEST, DEV, Broken variants, disabled items, and unresolved string references

**Output:**
- Generates 76 weapon wiki templates

## Data Files
- Added `source/DT_Weapons.json` weapon data export
EOF
\)")
